prefercite.p: Academy of Management Memorabilia #5289 MB. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5289: Academy of Management. Records, 1942-2000 5289 P: Academy of Management. Photographs. 5289 PUBS: Academy of Management. Publications, 2005. 5289 PUBS(d): AoM. Publications (digital)

scopecontent.p: Zippered briefcases - navy with gold lettering "Academy of Management, New York 1982", "Compliments of : Long Island Universtiy, C.W. Post Center, School of Business"
White cotton t-shirts, 1 with front lettering--"Eastern Academy of Management, Providence, EAM, '93, Berlin, Paul-Lobe-Institut" and back has picture with lettering "Brandenburger Tor, Berlin"
White cotton t-shirts, 4 with front lettering--"Hong Kong-Beijing-Portland-1989-EAM, Eastern Academy of Management"
Gold and maroon metal lapel pins with scrolled lettering "EAM"
Buttons- white with red lettering - 3 each - "Portland, EAM, 1989, Hong Kong" ; "D.C.-1988, EAM, Hong Kong-1989" ; "Boston, 1987, Athens"
Badge with lettering- " Arthur G Bedeian, Louisiana State Univ. - Academy of Management 1990, Annual Meeting" ; attached purple ribbon with gold lettering "Past President"

In Recognition of outstanding contributions to the profession of Management by superior research, scholarship and furtherance of this Society and its precepts, hereby bestows upon Karl D. Reyer the Honor of Fellow in the Academy with obligations and responsibilities to maintain the standards of the profession and further its usefulness. December 29, 1937
